title.rendered: The “Consultation Technical Workshop on the Concept Document on Mutual Recognition of Professional Qualifications” is currently underway

content.rendered:
The “Consultation Technical Workshop on the Concept Document on Mutual Recognition of Professional Qualifications” is currently underway!
 
This workshop brings together key participants from the Ministry of Education, Science, Technology, and Innovation (MESTI) and its Division of Regulated Professions and Legal Department, the European Union Office in Kosovo, the Office of the Prime Minister, the Ministry of Industry, Entrepreneurship and Trade (MIET), other line ministries, chambers, and relevant stakeholders.
 
The focus is on discussing the concept document and strategies for the mutual recognition of professional qualifications, aiming to enhance cross-border professional mobility and standards
